clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

findPasswordHash: select password from user_table where username = ?
findBySearchTerm: select u.id, u.type_id as username, u.login as email,  u.name as "firstName", u.patronymic as "lastName",  u.surname as "fullName" from user_table u join  user_type t on u.type_id = t.id where upper("username") like (?)  or upper("email") like (?) or upper("fullName") like (?)
findByUsername: select u.id, u.type_id as username, u.login as email,  u.name as "firstName", u.patronymic as "lastName",  u.surname as "fullName" from user_table u join  user_type t on u.type_id = t.id where username::text = ?
findById: select u.id, u.type_id as username, u.login as email,  u.name as "firstName", u.patronymic as "lastName",  u.surname as "fullName" from user_table u join  user_type t on u.type_id = t.id where id::text = ?
listAll: select u.id, u.type_id as username, u.login as email,  u.name as "firstName", u.patronymic as "lastName",  u.surname as "fullName" from user_table u join  user_type t on u.type_id = t.id
